Introduction
This topic contains information on award adjustments that may be necessary based on information a beneficiary provides on
VA Form 21-0538
or
VA Form 21P-0537
, including
determining whether due process is necessary
, and
processing a
VA Form 21-0538
that reveals a change in the status of a dependent(s)
VA Form 21P-0537
that shows the surviving spouse has remarried
VA Form 21-0538
that does not show the date of the event that necessitates removal of a former dependent(s) from a Veteran’s award
, and
VA Form 21P-0537
that does not show the date of change in a surviving spouse’s marital status
.
title: M21-1, Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Verification of Marital Status and the Status of Dependents
citation: Part VII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
